author: Bodmer
message:
Silicon bug work-around for Issue #21

There is a silicon bug in the ESP32, writing the same value to a
register twice sometimes fails. TFT_CS needs a delay though, so the fix
is to write two different values to the register.

author: turiphro
message:
Fix width/height override issue when using setRotation

This commit fixes an issue when setting screen width
and height from the constructor (e.g., user sketch),
followed by setRotation(i). Previously, setRotation
used TFT_WIDTH and TFT_HEIGHT, ignoring user overrides.
files_changed: TFT_Drivers/ILI9163_Rotation.h, TFT_Drivers/ILI9341_Rotation.h, TFT_Drivers/RPI_ILI9486_Rotation.h, TFT_Drivers/S6D02A1_Rotation.h, TFT_Drivers/ST7735_Rotation.h, TFT_eSPI.cpp, TFT_eSPI.h

author: Bodmer
message: Use direct write, fix bug for TFT_CS pin >31

author: Bodmer
message:
Fix #503

The s60sc Adafruit_Touch library fork for the ESP32 parallel mode uses the TFT_WR pin as an analogue input to read the screen resistance.  The TFT_eSPI library kept TFT_CS low permanently for performance reasons, but when used with the touch library a low analogue value on the TFT_WR pin will write spurious data to the display. 

This change toggle TFT_CS so it is only low during TFT parallel bus writes. The performance reduction is small.

author: Bodmer
message:
Update to aid use of ESP32 with multiple displays #687

Fix issue when using ESP32 & using multiple TFT displays & not defining TFT_CS.

Note: Future support for multiple displays in all possible hardware combinations may not be practical.

author: Bodmer
message:
Fix #740 and #704

#740: To avoid ambiguity the pushSprite for writing a sprite to another sprite has been renamed pushToSprite

#704: Change to 18 bit colurs for SSD1963 with SPI interface

Remove outdated TFT_SPIFFS_Jpeg example
files_changed: Extensions/Sprite.cpp, Extensions/Sprite.h, Processors/TFT_eSPI_ESP32.h, TFT_Drivers/SSD1963_Defines.h, TFT_Drivers/SSD1963_Init.h, TFT_eSPI.h, examples/160 x 128/TFT_SPIFFS_Jpeg/JPEG_functions.ino, examples/160 x 128/TFT_SPIFFS_Jpeg/SPIFFS_functions.ino, examples/160 x 128/TFT_SPIFFS_Jpeg/TFT_SPIFFS_Jpeg.ino, examples/Generic/ESP32_SDcard_jpeg/ESP32_SDcard_jpeg.ino, library.json, library.properties
